90313.「衣装を かえるのね！\n それじゃ 何を着たらいいかしら？\n<break>:
You're changing outfits! What should I wear,
then?<break>

90316.「剣を かえるのね！\n どれを 装備すればいいの？\n<break>:
You're changing swords! Which one should I
equip?<break>

90317.「あら やめておくのね。\n それじゃ どれを装備する？\n<break>:
Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no. So, which one do
you want to equip?<break>

90319.「盾を かえるのね！\n どれを 装備すればいいの？\n<break>:
You're changing shields! Which one should I
equip?<break>

90320.「あら やめておくのね。\n それじゃ どれを装備する？\n<break>:
Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no. So, which one do
you want to equip?<break>

90937.今 装備している装備品ですが\nよろしいですか？\n<yesno 2><clos:
The equipment you have now, if you don't
mind.<yesno 2><close>

90938.新品の装備品です！\n他人に渡せなくなりますが よろしいですか？\n<yesno:
It's brand-new equipment! You won't be able to
give it to anyone else, is that okay?
<yesno 2><close>

90939.「あら？ 私が装備できるものを\n 持っていないみたい。\n<end>:
What? You don't have anything I can equip you
with...<end>

90940.ロックされている装備品ですが\nよろしいですか？\n<yesno 2><clos:
It's a locked piece of equipment, if you
don't mind.<yesno 2><close>

90942.「私が装備できる 衣装を持っていないみたい。\n もし すてきな衣装が手に入った:
I don't have a costume that I can equip... If
you get a nice costume, I'd appreciate it if
you could bring it to me...<end>

91331.アンルシアが装備している\n<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM>を は:
Do you want to remove the
<%sL_ITEM><%sL_PLUSNUM> that Anlucia is
wearing?<yesno 2><close>

93539.「あらっ？ その衣装なら\n ちょうど今 着ているものよ。\n<bw_break:
What? That's the outfit I'm wearing right
now...<bw_break>

93725.「私の装備を かえるのね。\n 何を かえたらいいかしら？\n<break>:
I need to change my equipment. What do you
want me to replace?<break>

93792.「ほかに 何を かえたらいいかしら？\n<break>: What else could I replace it with?<break>
